item.title: What to know about the Bank of Japan's interest rate hike
item.description: The Bank of Japan raised its key interest rate Friday to a 30-year high, as widely expected, and financial markets shrugged

item.title: Asian shares advance after Japan raises its key interest rate to its highest level in 30 years
item.description: Shares are moderately higher in Asia and U.S. futures are mixed after the Bank of Japan raised its key policy rate to its highest level in 30 years

item.title: Canada and the US to launch formal talks to review their free trade agreement in mid-January
item.description: Canadian Prime Minister Mark Carneyâ€™s office says Canada and the U.S. will launch formal discussions to review the free trade agreement in mid-January

item.title: Implosion will take down a nearly century-old Mississippi River bridge
item.description: Crews are set to blow up the 94-year-old Black Hawk Bridge bridge over the Mississippi River

item.title: Bank of Japan raises its key policy rate to 0.75% to help tame inflation and support the yen
item.description: Bank of Japan raises its key policy rate to 0.75% to help tame inflation and support the yen
